document.full_text: soldiers in burkina faso fired their weapons near the presidential palace late on thursday, a military source told reuters, following a series of protests by the army since last month.
document.title: disgruntled soldiers fire in burkina's capital
lines_and_colors: soldiers in burkina faso fired their weapons near the presidential palace late on thursday, a military source told reuters, following a series of protests by the army since last month.
